post:
If you are searching for both a professional and **high quality VPS**, but also care about fair pricing, **Colorhost.de** is the right choice for you.
You get to choose between "**Xen**" and "**OpenVZ**" virtual servers.
For each type of server we offer **8 different packages** divided by either small or large hardware.
This ensures that you will find the perfect matching virtual server for your desired use.


We are trying to give to you the best experience possible with our VPS.

**Testfile for Downloads:**

http://colorhost.de/testdownload1G.img - 1GB Testfile


To achieve this aim our **Service & Support** include:
» Full Traffic flat
» over 30 different OS-Templates available (http://colorhost.de/en/vserver-operating-systems/)
» TUN/TAP Device
» iPhone/Android App for VPS control
» 24/7/365 Availability for you
» Daily Backups
» Reactiontime : ø < 15 Minutes
» Monitoring
» 16 Different Packages
» Quality Hosting at Global Switch FFM


VPS Overview:
http://colorhost.de/en/server/vserver/
